messages.caption: Choproff
messages.wellcome: Hello! I am professor Choproff. We were researching the Earth so long, so we collected some interesting facts. And I’m here to put you some questions, to see if you know these facts or not
messages.win: You won, this items are yours
messages.lost: I’m sorry, but maybe you haven’t tried enough. Try again!
messages.questions: What is the name of the bird that can fly backwards: #it is Hummingbird birds can’t fly backwards, it’s impossible only dragons could fly backwards but they are all dead Name an animal that can see behind itself without turning its head: dog and cat #rabbit and parrot only Jellyfish can do so Where do the flowers with the biggest blooms grow: on the Mars #in the tropical forests in the flowerpots What is the oldest animal: #tortoise mickey Mouse cat What animal has the biggest eyes: scared mouse #squid owl What is the fastest bird on the Earth: #falcon white Parrot red Parrot How many continents do we have today on the Earth: the Earth doesn’t have any continent #6 20 What does it mean Greek word Pangea: #entire earth happy birthday good luck Which is the Earth's only natural satellite: the Sun a Chobot City #the Moon $Which is the reason of many craters on the Moon’s surface: #meteor crashes astronauts chobots did them Which is the only object in space that man has ever visited: #Moon Milky Way Mars The Moon is covered with seas: full of syrup #without water full of cheese The Moon orbits the Earth: no, the Earth orbits the Moon the Moon can’t orbit the Earth because it’s made of cheese #yes, it does Which side does the Polar Star point: east west #north How many times does the Polar Star larger than the sun: #50 100 201 Why did the Polar Star serve as a guide for travelers over millennia: #it doesn't change its location in the sky it’s the only star in the sky it looks nice Plant the Venus Flytrap catches and digests: #insects and spiders other plants elephants Are there any plants that can digest insects: no, there are only plants that can digest elephants yes, but only in case there are no elephants #yes, they are called Flytraps We can find flying fish: in our dream only in fairy tale only #in all of the major oceans Why does flying fish have ability to fly: #in order to escape from predators in order to see the sun in order to become a cosmonaut When does the plant Flytrap close the trap: when it goes to bed #when an insect comes into contact with one or more of the hairs on the leaves when it’s not hungry any more When does the plant Flytrap resume hunting: #only after it has digested its previous prey each Friday plants don’t hunt The flying fish can: make pancakes #make short gliding flights through air, above the surface of the water dance The human organism by 65% consists of: bones cookies #water Whose organism contains has higher percentage of the water: the old man’s a driver’s #a baby’s It is essential for people to have access to: #clean fresh water to sweets to Chobots world Which is the fastest land animal on Earth that can speed up to 70 mph: no animal can run that fast #cheetah scared turtle Peregrine Falcon can reach speeds of over 270 mph when: running #flying downwards it flies in the plane The gigantic squid's eyes are larger than: #The eyes of any other animal that has ever existed on Earth A soccer field the Squids don’t have eyes Who created the first hot air balloon: Harry Potter #Montgolfier brothers Scrooge McDuck The air balloon created by Montgolfier brothers was filled with: Water Fog #Hot air Montgolfier brothers created: #The first hot air balloon A trampoline Chobots The first manned flight ever was made in: #a hot air balloon a cold air balloon a train What does enable a flying fish to take short gliding flights through air: engine #pectoral fins wings On people's dirty skin are accumulated: mushrooms #various germs and bacteria coins Various germs and bacteria are accumulated on: the Sun a soap #people's dirty skin Which is the coldest, windiest, highest and driest continent on Earth: Africa #Antarctica Mars People in Antarctica have to breathe through special masks because: the fresh air stinks there is a carnival all the year round #it’s very cold there A giant sequoia’s stem thickness is nearly 10: #meters centimeters kilogram Which is the smallest bird on Earth (adults weigh 2 grams or 0.07ounces): ostrich #hummingbird mosquito The biggest flower blooms are on: #a plant called Rafflesia a fir tree a coconut tree The flower Rafflesia has the biggest: car #blooms ambition How does an ant act when it’s intoxicated: it sings #it falls over on its right side it asks stupid questions Can an ant lift an elephant: yes, it can only if it knows Chuck Norris in person #no, it can lift only 50 times its own weight Armadillo eats only: hamburgers #insects french cheese dor bleu Armadillo has: #100 teeth 5 legs 2 cars and 1 villa in Miami What is a size of blue whale’s heart: a size of a big house #a size of a small car a size of a mouse Is a blue whale the largest creature that has ever lived on earth: no, dinosaurs were bigger than blue whales, weren’t they? #yes, it is next question please A sheep have four chambers stomach because: #it helps them to digest the food sheep are big fans of ALF only Chopix knows the answer How many chambers do the ships have: the ships don’t have stomach no one ever counted #four A Great White Shark inhabits: the woods the Internet #the oceans Who is more dangerous: an ant a moderator #a great white shark Blackspot angelfish can change from female to male: when there is a president election in the US #not by simply wishing, the change happens for a specific reason with the help of sith dark side power Is the sun a big star: yes, it is huge star and has a enough energy to power 5604 houses #no, It is actually a very small star yes, it is a very big TV star. It has it’s own TV show Sun is made of: honey pure CHO energy #it is made up of hot gasses How old is the sun: nobody except Vayerman knows it #about 4.5 million years old it shouldn’t be very old, it doesn’t look like an old star, maybe 100 years? How long the sun will exist: the sun will exist forever i don’t care. #sun will continue to be in existence for 5 million more years Cockroaches can live for a month without: #food they don’t live that long parties What cockroaches can hold for 45 minutes: their money #their breath hot potato The cockroaches can slow down: #their heart rate the falling of Dow Jones Index ONLY COCKROACHES CAN SLOW DOWN CHUCK NORRIS Do the cockroaches withstand radiation better than humans: #yes, they do yes, only if they wear special anti-rad costume hah! Of course no Wind carries over 100 million tons of sand grains around the Earth: per hour #per year each time you say “can I become a moderator?”. Does Armadillo has more teeth than any other land mammal: No #Yes Who? Blue whale weight is equal to: #22 elephants 2 airplanes with elephants and 1 airplane without elephants 12 chobots after they ate a giant pill The oldest living thing on Earth is: dinosaur #the flowering shrubs called Creosote Bushes master Joda Creosote Bushes can be located: #in the Mojave Desert in Tinagothic chobot-house on 2nd floor behind the furniture in some craters of the Moon How old can be Creosote Bushes: nobody knows #11000 years old how should I know this? Who are the largest and strongest of living birds: penguins hummingbird #ostriches What is the height of ostriches: 1 m 29 cm and 33 mm #2.4m(about 8 ft) The height of Ostriches is equal to their width multiplied by 2 What is the weight of Ostriches: #their weight is up to 136 kg(300 lb) their maximum weight is 50 kg their weight is 250 kg when they feel happy and 222 kg when they are depressed Male ostriches are: sad #black with white wings and tail what do I do here? Ostriches are: my neighbors #rapid runners I like cookies Ostriches can attain speed : about 300 km/s after they have used a speed magic #about 65 km/h (40 mph) about 10 mph Weight of ostriches’ eggs is: 100 kg there is no right answer. Please ask next question. #1.4 kg (about 3 lb) When does father ostrich take care about the eggs: the male sings all the night and female make some spaghetti during the day. #the male sits on eggs at night, and the female incubates them by day the male ostriches think about peace in whole world and female about how to produce more eggs during the day. What is the name of the highest trees: money trees #giant sequoias christmas trees The highest trees Giant sequoias are up to: 100 meters wide !233*40/0.003 + sin60 – arctg2 #100 meters high What is the brightest thing in the sky: an airplane #the Sun the Moon What is the Sun: electric lamp inhabited planet #small star Giant sequoia’s height is more than: #60 adult man’s height height of 2 Titanics height of 1 Eiffel tower
